to Knowledge and Ambition characters
Boosts amount of beli received by 2x
Boosts ATK of all characters by 1.5x, boosts amount of beli received by 2x

Boosts ATK of Shooter and Freedom characters by 2x following a chain of Good > Great > Perfect hits
Boosts ATK of Shooter and Freedom characters by 3x following a chain of Good > Great > Perfect hits
Boosts ATK and HP of Tough characters by 1.25x
Boosts ATK and HP of Tough characters by 1.5x
Boosts ATK of Fighter characters by 2x, reduces damage received by 10%
Boosts ATK of Ambition characters by 1.5x, boosts amount of beli received by 1.2x
Boosts ATK and RCV of Tough characters by 1.75x
Boosts ATK of Tough characters by 3x after scoring 3 Perfects in a row
Boosts ATK of Ambition characters by 3x following a chain of Good > Great > Perfect hits
Boosts ATK and HP of Striker and Knowledge characters by 1.5x
Boosts ATK of Fighter and Freedom characters by 1.75x and their RCV by 1.25x
Boosts ATK of Shooter characters by 2x if HP is above 99% at the start of the turn
Boosts ATK of Shooter characters by 2.75x if HP is above 99% at the start of the turn
Boosts ATK of Slasher characters by 2.5x if HP is below 30% at the start of the turn
Boosts ATK of Slasher characters by 2.75x if HP is below 30% at the start of the turn
Boosts ATK and RCV of Knowledge characters by 1.5x if HP is below 30% at the start of the turn
Boosts ATK of Knowledge characters by 2.5x and their RCV by 1.75x if HP is below 30% at the start of the turn
Boosts ATK of PSY characters by 2x, their RCV by 1.5x, makes [INT] orbs
to PSY characters

Boosts ATK of QCK characters by 2.5x if they have a matching orb
Boosts ATK of QCK characters by 3x if they have a matching orb, by 1.2x otherwise
Boosts ATK and RCV of Knowledge characters by 1.2x
